name: Mattermost
headline: Secure Collaboration for Technical Teams
description:
Mattermost provides secure collaboration for technical and operational teams that work in environments with complex nation-state level security and trust requirements. We serve technology, public sector, national defense and financial services industries with customers ranging from tech giants, to the world’s largest banks, to the U.S. Department of Defense and governmental agencies around the world. 

Our self-hosted and cloud offerings provide team messaging, file sharing, integrations, audio and screen share, workflow automation and project management on an open source platform deployed by the world’s most secure and mission critical organizations. We co-build the future of collaboration with over 4,000 open source project contributors who’ve provided over 30,000 code improvements towards our shared product vision, which is translated into 20 languages.

## What sets Mattermost apart
We help more focused, adaptable and resilient decision cycles and outcomes.
![Globe](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%201224%201128'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
[ ![Adaptibility](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20265%20265'%3E%3C/svg%3E) ](http://mattermost.com/</the-mattermost-difference/adaptability/>)
### Adaptability
Flexible platform that’s fully customizable and can be deployed anywhere.
[ ![Focus](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20265%20265'%3E%3C/svg%3E) ](http://mattermost.com/</the-mattermost-difference/focus/>)
### Focus
Collaborative workflows and integrations to help focus on mission-critical work.
[ ![Alert Icon](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20265%20265'%3E%3C/svg%3E) ](http://mattermost.com/</the-mattermost-difference/resilience/>)
### Resilience
Fully self-sovereign infrastructure and complete service control to reduce third-party risk.

  * [Playbooks](http://mattermost.com/<#playbooks>)
  * [AI](http://mattermost.com/<#ai>)

Channels
### Single source of truth for every conversation, process, and activity
Channels eliminate communication silos and let your teams collaborate freely. Message, meet, talk and screen share within fully secure, searchable channels.
[Learn More](http://mattermost.com/<https:/mattermost.com/channels/>)
Playbooks
### Orchestrate and execute repeatable processes with better command
Checklist-based process playbooks with workflow orchestration in one unified location.
[Learn More](http://mattermost.com/<https:/mattermost.com/playbooks/>)
AI
### AI-accelerated workflows with 100% data control
Harness the power of any LLM alongside your conversations without sacrificing flexibility, privacy, or security.
[Learn More](http://mattermost.com/</copilot/>)
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%201134%20760'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
Security
### Built for the strictest security, privacy, and compliance requirements
Deployable in on-prem (or air-gapped) environments, highly-regulated industries trust us to help them move fast with the lowest risk.
[Learn More](http://mattermost.com/<https:/mattermost.com/security/>)
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%201118%20749'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
Segmented Deployment
### Deploy to air-gapped edge, private cloud, or public cloud
Mattermost offers multiple deployment options so you can collaborate effectively even in the most protected and secretive environments.
[Talk to an Expert](http://mattermost.com/</contact-sales/>)
![Mattermost Deployment](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%201097%20748'%3E%3C/svg%3E)

## USAF improves mission information availability by 4x
“Using Mattermost offers a huge benefit in mission velocity and safety. We found that also gave us a lot more time to fix cargo and fuel problems before the crew even shows up at the airplane.”
[![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20640%20628'%3E%3C/svg%3E)](http://mattermost.com/</customers/us-department-of-defense/>)
Major Justin Poole
Phoenix Spark Innovation Cell Director at Travis Air Force Base
![AICPA SOC, HIPAA, FINRA](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20675%20110'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
## Built for teams with stringent security & privacy requirements
[Read more about Security »](http://mattermost.com/</security/>)
  * Built-in identity and access controls
  * Granular admin controls
  * Full control over your data


  * Advanced compliance auditing & reporting
  * Flexible on-prem and secure cloud deployment
  * Designed for enterprise scalability


  * Deployable in air-gapped networks and BYOD environments
  * Cloud-neutral and self-host deployment options

generated_description:
**Company Summary: Mattermost**

**Overview:**
Founded in 2016 and part of Y Combinator Batch S12, Mattermost is a collaboration platform designed for technical teams in high-stakes environments that demand top-level security. With its headquarters in Palo Alto, California, the company boasts a talented team of 120 employees. Mattermost aims to deliver secure collaboration solutions specifically tailored for technology, public sector, national defense, and financial services industries. Its clientele includes big names like tech giants, major banks, military organizations, and government agencies worldwide.

**Mission:**
Mattermost’s mission is straightforward: to facilitate secure collaboration among technical teams. This focus on security is vital, considering the sensitive nature of its clientele, particularly in sectors like national defense and finance.

**Key Features:**
Mattermost offers a versatile communication platform that encompasses:
- **Team Messaging**: Efficient and secure messaging for teams to stay connected.
- **File Sharing**: Seamless sharing of files within a controlled environment.
- **Integrations**: Connects with existing tools and workflows.
- **Audio and Screen Sharing**: Facilitating remote collaboration effortlessly.
- **Workflow Automation**: Streamlining processes to improve efficiency.
- **Project Management**: Tools designed to help teams manage tasks effectively.
- **Open Source Platform**: Enables customization and flexibility, with contributions from over 4,000 open-source project contributors resulting in over 30,000 code improvements.

**Security:**
Given its clientele, security is at the forefront of Mattermost's offerings. The platform is built to support stringent security protocols and can be deployed in highly regulated environments or air-gapped networks, ensuring users retain full control over their data.

**Market Position:**
Mattermost has positioned itself uniquely in the market by being a collaboration hub specifically designed for mission-critical use cases. This includes integrated security operations, command and control processes, and facilitating real-time DevSecOps collaboration.

**Current Activities:**
Mattermost is actively enhancing its offerings with new solutions tailored for markets that require high security and resilience. The platform's ability to integrate with tools like Microsoft Teams, Atlassian, and GitLab emphasizes its adaptability and ease of use for organizations already entrenched in these ecosystems.

**Customer Base:**
Some notable clients using Mattermost include:
- United States Air Force (USAF)
- Fujitsu
- CERN
- RTE (Réseau de Transport d'Électricité)
- NRI (Nomura Research Institute)
- Others from various sectors, solidifying its presence across critical industries.

**The Future:**
By co-building the future of collaboration with its community and partners while focusing on innovation and security, Mattermost is set to continue leading the charge for collaboration tools that cater to environments where trust and resilience are paramount.

**Website:** [Mattermost Website](http://mattermost.com)

In summary, Mattermost represents a critical shift in collaboration paradigms, employing advanced security and integration capabilities to meet the needs of its clients, particularly in high-stakes industries. Its combination of flexibility, security, and adaptability makes it a standout choice for teams aiming to enhance their collaborative efforts while maintaining rigorous standards.
